name: A Tight Scare
description:
A (or left arrow) to move left

D (or right arrow) to move right

If you see something floating above your head, press E.

Click on small objects. (like flashlights)

Find out what that noise was, and fast!

Also sorry for everything being a bit messy lol.

There are 2 endings. (Inspired by SamuriaDev's  Atlernate Invader)

I made everything, and I downloaded some sfx's because...... I'm dumb. 0/\0

Click the play button, listen to the song, and the game will start.

I made this for the Pixel Game Jam 2022
